detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bomber jacket in airy satin with a ribbed collar, zip down the front, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring hem. Unlined.

Trousers in an airy wool weave with a high waist and pleats at the top to create volume. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, jetted back pockets with a flap and discreet side pockets. Wide legs that taper to the hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sports jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and a contrasting colour panel down the outside of the sleeves. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and gently tapered, ankle-length legs.
Metal stud and hoop earrings in various designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 2 cm.
Pyjama shorts in soft patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist,a fake fly and side pockets.
Wide one-shoulder top in a crinkled viscose and cotton blend with a wide flounce at the top.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with decorations. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Turban in a soft cotton knit with a knot detail at the front and a ribbed hem.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Seam with a sewn-on, wide jersey belt that ties at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pocket. Yoke at the back, 3/4-length sleeves, narrow cuffs with a button, and slits in the side seams. Slightly longer at the back.
Short coat in a sturdy weave. Opening with a scalloped trim at the front and front pockets. Lined.
Derby shoes with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
V-neck top in a supersoft, fine-knit viscose blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and lace trim at the hem. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and super-skinny legs.
Dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar and buttons at the front. Flap chest pockets, a yoke at the back, drawstring at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey with a cutaway collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, and press-studs at the cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with an embroidered motif and worn details in a loose fit. High waist, low crotch, button fly and tapered legs.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cold shoulder jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with a glittery pattern. Elastication and a frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves, side pockets and elastication at the waist and hems.
Pattern-weave car coat with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Long raglan sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Coat in soft, felted wool containing some cashmere with notch lapels, a welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and single back vent. Unlined.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Blouse in airy chiffon with pin-tucks and concealed buttons down the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves with sewn-in pleats at the shoulders. Lined front and back.

Blouse in a airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise and a scalloped hem. V-neck with a wide, scalloped flounce around the neckline and a yoke with scalloped flounces at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a scalloped flare at the cuffs.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.
Sleeveless fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen and a V-neck front and back.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a lightly brushed, velvety finish and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Embroidered appliqués on the back, ribbed cuffs and an elasticated hem. Slightly longer at the back. Pile lining.
Ankle boots in suede with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with thermal fleece inside. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets, ribbed panels at the sides and long raglan sleeves.
Short dress in stretch jersey with short sleeves.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Shorter, straight-cut top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline and long, wide raglan sleeves.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Long, sleeveless dress in patterned satin with a gathered, elasticated neckline, short, double shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with short trumpet sleeves and a round hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Knee-length dress in an airy weave with decorative pin-tucks, a V-neck, buttons at the top and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back, a narrow, detachable tie belt and a softly draping skirt. Lined.
Kangol x H&M. Oversized T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Round neckline, dropped shoulders and a small appliqué above the hem.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cardigan in a soft, chunky, glittery knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No fasteners.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.

Blouse in woven fabric with inset lace trims, a small stand-up collar, a concealed zip at the back and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with wide lace buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of shorts in an airy, viscose weave. Top with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and tie-detail at the front hem. Shorts with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Soft jersey vest top in a relaxed fit with a rib trim around the neckline and deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, side pockets and flap chest pockets. Seam with a drawstring and ties under the bust and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Imitation suede cap with an adjustable fastener at the back. Mesh lining.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft, lightweight wool jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned viscose weave with flounces, a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist.
Joggers in airy, lightweight jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Oversized, jacquard-knit cardigan with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Metal rings in various designs, four with plastic stones.
Calf-length trousers in linen. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in striped cotton jersey.
Short, sleeveless top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a square neckline front and back.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a scalloped trim, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Three-strand metal chain necklace. One of the chains has a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Long-sleeved knitted jumper in a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a slit in the sides.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Oversized shirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen, notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and a square neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Flounces around the neckline front and back, and a seam at the waist.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs and sizes. Length from 3 cm to 7.5 cm.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Visible, gathered seam down the sleeves and back. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
V-neck blouse in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with buttons at the front, 3/4-length sleeves and a wide flounce at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a small frilled collar and an opening with ties at the back and back of the neck. Short, frill-trimmed raglan sleeves, and seams to create tiers at the waist and hem for added width. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Popover jacket in soft fleece with a kangaroo pocket, stand-up collar and zip at the top with a chin guard. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Strapless, microfibre body with a super push-up bra section. The body has a light sculpting effect on the waist and seat. The bra has underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, lace-trimmed hems and a lined gusset with press-studs. Shoulder straps included.
